src:
AP Top Rhode Island Headlines at 1:53 a.m. EDT
01 Nov 2019, 04:00 by EndPlay
Police: Man shot campground owner after being told to leave
Ethics commission to investigate Providence councilman
Thousands lose power as severe thunderstorms sweep north
Chalices stolen from Rhode Island church returned
Rhode Island's governor ceremoniously signs 2 bills
